locations.name: High Street

locations.name: Tavern
locations.description: nice warm tavern for the best meads

locations.name: Graveyard
locations.description: spooky graveyard! Do not stay here at night

locations.name: Pond
locations.description: pond which houses frogs and gentle waters that revitalizes those who bathe in it
